hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
deploy_in=( us-west-1 sa-east-1 eu-central-1 ap-southeast-1 )
cp -r /home/jenkins/secrets cdn/
# Here we are assuming that cp-master build run before and we have binary. Otherwise need to deploy master first. Need to fix it in future cp /tmp/cp-master cdn/secrets/cp
for region in ${deploy_in[@]}; do ANSIBLE_HOST_KEY_CHECKING=False ansible-playbook cdn/cdn.yml -c paramiko \ -e "ansible_ssh_user=ubuntu" \ -e "ansible_ssh_private_key_file=/home/jenkins/.ssh/id_rsa" \ -e "aws_key_name=ansible" \ -e "cdn_domain=cdn" \ -e "kurjun_master=eu0.cdn.subut.ai" \ -e "aws_region=$region" done
